sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Button, Card, CardActions, CardContent, Typography, Grid } from '@material-ui/core'; import vs from '../images/vs.png' import { getMatchDetail } from '../api/Api'; const MyCard = ({ match }) => { const handleClick = (id) => { getMatchDetail(id). then(). catch() } return ( {match["team-1"]} {match["team-2"]} ) } export default MyCard
